name: Elfball
description:
These ancient woods are besieged by undead elves and long forgotten beasts, and you and your party of elves are here to stop them in the name of your ancestors! Gather more elves to grow your party and roster of abilities, while seeing how many enemies you can eradicate before your party succumbs to their growing ranks.

All source code for this game can be found in the distribution files, and on my Github at: https://github.com/cheslinga/elfball-7drl, all licensed under the AGPL v3.0.
